title: A copie of a challenge, taken owt [sic] of the confutation of M. Iuells sermon made by Iohn Rastell
author: Rastell, John, 1532-1577.
notes: Reprints leaves 160-176 of STC 20726:  A confutation of a sermon, pronounced by M. Juell, at Paules crosse, the second Sondaie before Easter (which Catholikes doe call Passion Sondaie) Anno Domini .M.D.LX.
Running title reads: A challenge agaynst the Protestantes.
At foot of title: Cum priuilegio.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
